original: intros A B RA RB x y f H1 H2. unfold rel_impl. intros H3. destruct (f x) eqn:E1; destruct (f y) eqn:E2; simpl in H3; auto. inversion H3. subst. apply sum_rel_ind. - intros x0 y0 H4. apply H2 in H4. rewrite E1, E2. apply le_aa. apply H4. - intros x0 y0 H4. apply H2 in H4. rewrite E1, E2. apply le_bb. apply H4. apply H1. apply H3.
